title: El Capitan (Mac OS) and Norton - Not speaking to one another
content:
I recently subscribed to Norton after many recommendations since AVG is not as good as it once was. I have not been with Norton for over 20 years due to the issues of Norton and earlier Mac applications. However, now, it's like old times -- when I add the Mac El Capitan to be protected by Norton everything looks ok however, when I go to open a page in Firefox, it just becomes a blank page. It won't load.

So, in other words: HELP!

Should I request a refund? Please advise.
creator: hblaswilson

title: Latest update of firefox browser (90.0 64-bit) Windows prevents ScriptSafe extension installtion
content:
It is unfortunate that today Tuesday July 13, 2021 latest firefox update deleted Scriptsafe extension and now I am unable to re-install it... I have been using firefox for many years on my systems and I have made annual contribution to the Mozilla organization. I am afraid if I could not install the Scriptsafe extension and may have to replace firefox browser with another browser.

Thank you for the help in advance. -Sed
creator: owneri

title: SCREEN SHOTS
content: Cannot take screen shots on google maps, street view. The screen shot is black.
creator: cromerbob
